title: Wear Launcher Fx
summary: ☆ The first REAL launcher for your smartwatch! Unlock your smartwatch power!

The included color-picker allows you to choose any color you have in mind;►Digital/Analog clock widgets - digital clock widget on homescreen and analog clock on lockscreen;►Add/remove shortcuts for your apps - add your favorite apps as shortcuts on launcher homescreen for quick access;►Hide/Unhide your apps - allows you to hide your apps directly from your smartwatch;►Uninstall/Remove apps - allows you to uninstall your apps directly from your smartwatch;►Brightness control - control your wear brightness from status bar;►Battery status control - check your wearable energy;►Lockscreen time control - auto lock wear after predefined seconds of inactivity;►Vibration based on actions - makes smartwatch vibrate when removing an app or unlocking the lockscreen;► Custom Settings App - comes with a configuration app to fine tune every aspect of this launcher;First time start To make it work when you first install it, please:* Open the app on your smartphone while the watch is connected;* Read installation guide from this companion app;* Click once and release the Power hardware button of your smartwatch;* Select Wear Launcher Fx as your default launcher for your smartwatch;* Everytime you enter lockscreen, exit the launcher or anytime you need it you can call it back using your POWER button (middle button of your device - quick press once on power an you'll have the launcher back in no time )  ☆Contact For any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact me:Email: scridon_catalin@ymail.com
descriptionHTML:
► You have to own an Android Wear device in order to use this app!
► Compatible with all Android Wear devices including support for round and rectangle displays;
► This app will replace your default Wear Launcher


☆ Wear Launcher Fx turns your Wear Device in something more than just a watch:

►Redesigned Wear GUI - includes homescreen, shortcut icons, status bar, free-to-use watchfaces, digital and analog clock widgets, menu style&animations for a whole new user experience;
►43 Wallpapers - choose your favorite wallpaper for your homescreen;
►13 Watchfaces - free-to-use watchfaces crafted for the launcher's own lockscreen;
►Compatible with your installed watchfaces - you can keep your favorite watchface if you want backward compatible;
►5 Menu Styles - organize your icons as a horizontal grid, horizontal/vertical pager, vertical list or as a native list;
►28 Animations - never get bored. Switch between 28 different animation effects for your navigation menu;
►Custom menu color - choose your favorite color for navigation menu and status bar. The included color-picker allows you to choose any color you have in mind;
►Digital/Analog clock widgets - digital clock widget on homescreen and analog clock on lockscreen;
►Add/remove shortcuts for your apps - add your favorite apps as shortcuts on launcher homescreen for quick access;
►Hide/Unhide your apps - allows you to hide your apps directly from your smartwatch;
►Uninstall/Remove apps - allows you to uninstall your apps directly from your smartwatch;
►Brightness control - control your wear brightness from status bar;
►Battery status control - check your wearable energy;
►Lockscreen time control - auto lock wear after predefined seconds of inactivity;
►Vibration based on actions - makes smartwatch vibrate when removing an app or unlocking the lockscreen;
► Custom Settings App - comes with a configuration app to fine tune every aspect of this launcher;

First time start

To make it work when you first install it, please:
* Open the app on your smartphone while the watch is connected;
* Read installation guide from this companion app;
* Click once and release the Power hardware button of your smartwatch;
* Select Wear Launcher Fx as your default launcher for your smartwatch;
* Everytime you enter lockscreen, exit the launcher or anytime you need it you can call it back using your POWER button (middle button of your device - quick press once on power an you'll have the launcher back in no time )

☆Contact
For any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact me:
Email: scridon_catalin@ymail.com
comments: The laucher works good.. I didn't get the app,to work on the phone it stayed stuck on loading screen BUT The app will install in the watch. Hit the button on the watch and it will bring up the menu run  wear launcher or android wear. Select laucher you will the laucher. I like that you can have apps on the home screen, and uninstalling apps from the watch is a plus. 3 apps shortcuts will show up on face but you can add more and scroll on icons

Confusing It says I can use it with my own watch face, but how? I set my watch face and the only way I can get this launcher back is to press the button on my watch, then my watch face is gone and I have to set it again. Maybe I'm stupid, or maybe it's just the way it is, who knows, nothing in the app to explain it.
doesn't work. sent email for help. no response yet.
It's cool. It's a great concept, but it lacks notification support and the lockscreen settings crashes, LG G Watch, 6.0.1 M1D64S.
